text: Hi, I am SocialNeedsBot. Let's talk a bit about social needs.

mod_text: do you have enough resources to pay for the very basics like food, housing, and medical care?
org_text: Do you have enough resources to pay for the very basics like food, housing, and medical care?
text: Would you mind sharing do you have enough resources to pay for the very basics like food, housing, and medical care?

mod_text: do you have any significant outstanding bills or debts?
org_text: Do you have any significant outstanding bills or debts?
prefix: Going forward, would you mind telling me
text: Going forward, would you mind telling me do you have any significant outstanding bills or debts?

mod_text: do you want help finding work or keeping work or a job?

options.text: I do not need or want help

org_text: Do you want help finding work or keeping work or a job?
prefix: Moving on, can i ask you
text: Moving on, can i ask you do you want help finding work or keeping work or a job?

mod_text: do you want help with school or training? For example, starting or completing job training or getting a high school diploma, GED or equivalent?
org_text: Do you want help with school or training? For example, starting or completing job training or getting a high school diploma, GED or equivalent?
text: Continuing, let me ask you do you want help with school or training? For example, starting or completing job training or getting a high school diploma, GED or equivalent?

mod_text: what is your housing situation today?

options.text: I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future
I do not have a steady place to live

org_text: What is your housing situation today?
text: Next, can i ask you what is your housing situation today?

mod_text: about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

options.text: Pests such as bugs, ants, or mice
Smoke detectors missing or not working

org_text: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)
text: Would you mind telling me think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

mod_text: in the past 12 months has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?
org_text: In the past 12 months has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?
text: Can you tell me in the past 12 months has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?

mod_text: within the past 12 months, were you worried whether your food would run out before you got money to buy more?
org_text: Within the past 12 months, were you worried whether your food would run out before you got money to buy more?
prefix: Going forward, would you mind sharing
text: Going forward, would you mind sharing within the past 12 months, were you worried whether your food would run out before you got money to buy more?

mod_text: within the past 12 months the food you bought just didn't last and you didn't have money to get more. Was this:
org_text: Within the past 12 months the food you bought just didn't last and you didn't have money to get more. Was this:
text: Could you tell me within the past 12 months the food you bought just didn't last and you didn't have money to get more. Was this:

mod_text: have you experienced difficulty getting needed services because you do not have transportation?
org_text: Have you experienced difficulty getting needed services because you do not have transportation?
text: Let me ask you have you experienced difficulty getting needed services because you do not have transportation?
We are done! Thanks for your patience.
